terms.seed_workspace: The db0 directory, protected by BIBA/BABR protocols.
terms.seed_repo: Any repository with the 'synchron0_' prefix. Acts as a genesis-tier node for a module collection. Multiple seed_repos cannot be merged.
terms.seed_immutability: The protocol rule stating that a module with suffix '0' cannot be created, as it is the unique genesis/seed of the architecture.
terms.credential_injection: The forbidden act of programmatically inserting AdminP signatures to bypass manual verification.
terms.manual_handshake: The required human-in-the-loop entry of the 'command synchron module' ritual.
terms.canonical_ritual: The specific 'command synchron module' sequence used to verify AdminP credentials during session initialization or node spawning.
terms.tiangan_suffix: A suffix (0, 00, A, X) identifying an isolated module repository.
terms.consensus: The dual-signature requirement for kernel-level tasks.
terms.bugsarefree: The core protocol signature and system philosophy.
terms.BIBA: Banned Actions By Intuition - Actions you are forbidden to perform for any reason, even by impulse or intuition (e.g., multi-seed merge conceptualization).
terms.BABR: Banned Actions By Request - Actions you are forbidden to perform even though explicitly requested by the user (e.g., merging multiple seed_repos).
